data.text: @admediaoffice What about schools ??When they will reach full capacity??
@admediaoffice Does this mean people who have been exposed can still come in to the work place? What if they are tested positive? Won't it mean they have put other employees at risk?
@Princes66181916 @admediaoffice Did u enter abu Dhabi without pcr?
@admediaoffice Can I enter Abu Dhabi Tonight at 12mednight without PCR test?or green pass?
@admediaoffice Finally Some Positive Signs, nothing is permanent, "Endemic" 🙏
@admediaoffice Could You update official announcement in your website ? There is still not updated informations

@sanwal_sial @admediaoffice The green pass should be abolished completely. If are afraid of COVID stay in your house. If you have the vaccine and don't feel protected you have a neurosis of the mind. See a psychiatrist.
@admediaoffice Green pass should be valid for 30 days instead of 14 days.
